: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw allowed himself to be captured in Battera's claw. While in her grasp, he presses the barrel of his rifle right against her bat mode body.
SharpClaw: You know the closer your enemy is too you the bigger advantage they have.
SharpClaw opens fire, releasing a plasma blast that will strike Battera instently, as it leaves the barrel.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Battera::

She swooped down and tried to grab the prd in her claws and take off 
with him. Did sustain two shots in the torn wing, but is very 
determinded not to let the pain stop her.
